title: Problems during 5.21 patch!!!!!!!
body:
I left my computer on sleep while my lol.patcher patch.When i woke up patcher was 75%.I clicked on it and patcher desapear.

Pls HELP!!!!!!!

replies.body:
HeyMrang2015, 

If you're having patching issues you should check out Riots Patcher KB. Make sure you follow the steps and it should fix you right up. 

Riot Patcher: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues

Reach out if you have any issues with it :) 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
